# VS Code Chat Prompt Improver Extension

This is a VS Code extension that adds a @prompt-improver chat participant to help users improve their prompts using AI and workspace context.

## Project Type
- VS Code Extension
- TypeScript
- Chat Participant API
- Language Model API

## Development Notes
- Use VS Code Extension API for chat participants
- Integrate with Language Model API for prompt analysis
- Gather workspace context to enhance prompts
- Follow VS Code extension best practices
